name: On Air Island: Survival Chat
description:
▶About the Game
You will become one of the “Never Stop Watching!” audience!
Text Adventure: Create your own story through the choices!
Survival Game: Your survival hinges on your decisions as the story unfolds!
Interactive: Uncover the island’s secrets with your character!
Various Characters: Experience a completely different story depending on the character!



“I’m all in! Send me your donation!”

Unforeseen events unfold on the main stage of a real-time survival program on a mysterious island.
Experience a whole new survival gaming experience with On Air Island!



No matter what happens, even when the cast is missing or dead, the show must go on.
Only your ‘donation’ can make a difference!
Who will manage to ‘safely’ escape? Their fate is in your hands!



👍Recommended for these people!
- Those who like mysterious stories or light novels
- Those who like free-to-play and indie game genres
- Those who are tired of typical story gameplay
- Tired of cliched games! Those who like unique indie game genres
